A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lots of holes\, too much over the top liberty taken by director.  Loss the magic of the old ones.  Dumb foofy disney penguins and crystal foxes clearly made for toy profit.\nWhy is there no development of Snoke?  Weak villains make weak heroes.  There are no more jedi masters?  Rey is once again overpowered without character development.\nNot that exciting\, over hyped.  Disney movies are good\, Star wars movies are great.  Disney Star Wars movies\, not so good.
